评论详情: These shoes are great. The only complaint I have is that I wish they were easier to clean. They get dirty so fast. The canvas is not easy to clean

Love these shoes for our girls! Love that they’re barefoot shoes and easy for our girls to slip on. They hold up pretty well to the every day wear of an 18 month old and a 6 year old who run wild most of the day. They’re fairly quick to dry when they get wet and easy to wash (we just throw them in the washing machine). My 6 year olds last pair started to rip a hole on the top layer of canvas (so not all the way through) about the time she was growing out of them and considering we got them when she grew out of the pair before that, I’d say it was perfect timing and well worth the money spent. Oh and my girls love that they can have matching pairs! It’s so hard to find that in shoes for their 5 year age gap, let alone being barefoot shoes!
Wide toe box, flat sole, easy to take on and off!

My son was learning to put on his own shoes so this hit the bill. It looked easy enough and it also had a wide toe box which was a plus, but unfortunately the mouth of the opening was too tight!! I even had a hard time getting them on, so unfortunately I had to return them. Bummer because they were cute, stylish, and lightweight

My son is 1.5 and these were his first shoes and once on they were so functional and mobile he ran around like he’s been wearing shoes for months! Seem durable but he loves them and they allow proper movement, toe splay, and are SO CUTE! He got so many compliments

Love the look of these. They are quite flexibility making them easy to slip on and off. For a toddler I would imagine they are relatively comfortable for the shoe quality. A good value for the price and fit seems accurate.
I loved the color, flexibility and fit. I didn’t like that after a few weeks of use it fell apart.

评论详情: Sounds strange to say but these are the best shoes I have ever bought for my kids, they are comfortable and don't hurt their feet, they are durable, easy to clean and overall our family favorite! Won't be buying any other kind again.
My son prefers these over his other shoes

My son has wide feet and sensory issues. These fit him perfect and he loves wearing them. He has no problem putting them on by himself because they are stretchy. They are also very easy to clean and durable, I just throw them in the wash.
My toddler got a blister from these. They were great at first but the heel doesn't hold it's shape well and rubs a sore.
Will be buying more
very convenient to use. durable.
They fit great lightweight and my son loves them. Will definitely buy more.
Bought for my grandson for back to school option. He has a wide foot and these shoes fit him perfectly. He wears them all the time as is evidenced in how they smell when he takes them off. Hahaha
Very wide and sturdy

Zero drop, WIDE toe box, flexible sole. True to size.
My 5 year old son loves these and wears them everyday to school, they are super easy to put on himself and he says they don't hurt his feet at all. Mom approved ! ☺️
feet don't sweat in them, they are quite light and soft.

These are awesome. The size is true to size. It will Last longer too as the toe box is alot bigger. He plays in these well at school. I wasn't for sure as they seemed thin but he walks over wood chip, Gravel, concrete, climbs parks, with no issue. I got the plain black to match his outfits.
We have enjoyed these cute and comfortable slip on shoes. They allow my toddler space for his growing toes and we get comments on how cute they are.
Bummed my sone grew out of them so fast. But we love them

Please make these exact shoes in larger sizes. Please. Foot-shaped shoes fit differently from regular shoes, so I got these hoping they'd still fit my daughter's feet. Unfortunately, they didn't, but they're still pretty amazing if they fit your kiddo's feet. They seem to be pretty accurate to normal size, whereas most others I've worn myself have had a significant difference from normal sizing. I highly recommend foot-shaped shoes for everyone, especially kids with developing feet. I wish I had been wearing these my whole life instead of normal shoes.

Love the style and color selection of these, my toddler says they’re so comfortable and aren’t heavy for her feet.  She wears them at school which are for mostly indoor use: we expect them to last her a little longer than normal. They’re easy to match with outfits but will be needed only for school days.  Planning on purchasing another pair for outdoor activities.  Only comment id say was the package was strange and not typical however wasn’t an issue. They arrived quickly and in great condition.  They were purchased with the intention of keeping her feet healthy; most brands are narrow and squish kids feet 🦶🏼 this was perfect for my child’s wide foot and met all our needs.  Hoping they last long!

I was having so much trouble finding easy to use wide toed shoes for the daughter and these are perfect for the price. I still think 30 is on the steep end for a product you end up using for only a few months but compared to the rest of the market, with some barefoot shoes costing 100+, this is a fantastic deal. Will order more in the future.
A little too big but will keep for later. Seemed like a comfortable shoe

I absolutely love these shoes and so does my son! I bought extra wide stride rite shoes for him and they were too narrow causing his feet to hurt. I’m so happy I found these. They look and feel great on him.

They're wide!! Holy smokes - thank goodness!!!  I've been desperately trying to find wide NON WATER SHOES for my daughter. The adventure of this has been a nightmare and the pricing of finding such shoe is either 100$ plus or just plain water shoes stating they're just barefoot shoes... well that doesn't work for school nor my pocket book. I'm very thankful for the price point, the true as advertised toe box width and for not being water shoes.

评论概述: Not as minimalist as I wanted, but great
评论详情: My toddler loves them. I wish they came in smaller sizes because he was in 4 and these are too big. I almost returned them because the sole felt much more stiff than I'd have liked. but I really wanted a close-toed shoe, and I opened them to let my kid try them on. He's a big fan. He asks to wear them and refuses to take them off outside.  Update: toddler has worn them for months and they're still in great shape. I took the insole out when they got a bit too snug and they've last a while. They even hold up well to puddles and stuff.

I was so excited to try the slip on version of these shoes for my little since we love the Velcro strap version so much. When the shoes arrived I opened the box I was immediately hit with the smell of sweaty feet. When I removed the shrink wrap from them I was saddened to see the condition the shoes were in. These shoes have been worn well past the point of just trying them on and returning them because you didn’t like them. This is unsanitary and there needs to be better standards set for quality control.

评论概述: Just what I was looking for!
评论详情: My boys’ feet were red from narrow shoes and just uncomfortable. I was looking for an easy slip on shoe with plenty of room in the toe box and these were just that! We’ve machine washed them and air dried with zero issues. Worth the money and will likely buy more.

Although at a quick glance these are similar to other slip on, lightweight shoes - they are actually much much better. Super flexible, a wide toe-box but snug padded heel, lightweight, durable. And I especially like the soft, padded towel-like lining which I think makes then super comfortable when barefoot. My son's only complaint was that they are not 'rainbow' coloured.

I love the wide toe box that supports the natural growth of my babies feet. I do wish the sole was more flexible to support more natural movement, but that said, they are super cute and good quality. I definitely would consider buying again once my kiddo sizes up.
